cards.title: Building skills for jobs
cards.body: Since 2020, Microsoft and LinkedIn have helped 80 million people access digital skills, Learn what's next in our work to ensure people have the technology, skills and opportunity to thrive in changing economy.

cards.title: Save up to $300 on Surface Laptop 5
cards.body: Sophisticated style and multitasking speed powered by 12th Gen Intel Core. Offer ends 1/22.

cards.title: Power your adventure
cards.body: Get an Xbox Series X and Forza Horizon 5 Premium Edition.

cards.title: Save up to $236 on new Surface Pro 9
cards.body: The tablet flexibility you want and the laptop performance you need--all in one ultra-portable device. Offer ends 1/15.

cards2.title: Surface Pro 9 for Business
cards2.body: Empower flexible, all-day impact with tablet portability and laptop performance. Questions? Book an online consultation.

cards2.title: Get Microsoft Teams for free
cards2.body: Online meetings, chat, and shared cloud ctorage--all in one place.

cards2.title: Welcome to your Windows 365 Cloud PC
cards2.body: Securely stream your Windows experience from the Microsoft cloud to any device.

cards2.title: Thrive in a hybrid world
cards2.body: Discover tools, resources, and strategies to help your employees succeed in the new world of flexible work.

cards3.title: Free 2-3 day shipping
cards3.body: Enjoy free expedited shipping, or choose ground shipping (3-7 business days) for lower carbon emissions on eligible orders in the contiguous US.

cards3.title: Free 30-day returns
cards3.body: Return almost any like-new product in its original packaging within 30 days (up to 60 days for Surface devices*).

cards3.title: Flexible payment options that start at 0% APR
cards3.body: Get what you want, when you want it with safe, simple payment options.

cards3.title: 30-day price promise
cards3.body: If you make a purchase from Microsoft Store and we lower the price within 30 days (up to 60 days for Surface devices), we'll refund you the difference. Exclusions may apply.*
